original_title: Por La Vía: Migrantes En La Ruta Del Pacífico
overview: Jorge, a Honduran migrant, crosses Mexico in "La Bestia" dreaming of getting to the United States, being that only 15 out of 100 migrants manage to get there. Along the way, he receives humanitarian aid through civil organizations and shelters that dignify the migrant's journey on the Pacific route.
title: Por La Vía: Migrantes En La Ruta Del Pacífico
